body: Particular spells and spell-like abilities are easier to use or more powerful in effect on planes with this trait than they are on the Material Plane. Natives of a plane with the enhanced magic trait are aware of which spells and spell-like abilities are enhanced, but planar travelers may have to discover this on their own. If a spell is enhanced, it functions as if its caster level was 2 higher than normal.
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Planar Adventures/Planar Traits/Magic Traits/Enhanced Magic
name: Enhanced Magic
